DOC.brief_summary: To date , clinical evidence efficacy safety Glucosanol maintain weight loss beyond study duration 12 week . The rationale open-label study assess efficacy prevent regain loss body weight safety Glucosanol subject overweight obese long period initial weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Glucosanol Maintaining Body Weight
DOC.criteria: Previously enrol , comply , complete INQ/K/003411 ( Glucosanol weight loss ) study , weight loss least 3 % baseline body weight Age 18 60 year time inclusion INQ/K/003411 study BMI 2535 time inclusion INQ/K/003411 study Expressed desire weight maintenance Accustomed 3 main meal per day Commitment avoid use weight loss product study Femalesʼ agreement use appropriate birth control method active study period Subject declare write his/her consent participate , understand requirement study willing comply Known sensitivity ingredient device ( Phaseolus vulgaris member Fabaceae family ) History diabetes mellitus • Fasting blood glucose 7 mmol/L History clinical sign endocrine disorder may influence body weight ( e.g . Cushingʼs disease , thyroid gland disorder ) Clinically relevant excursion safety parameter Current use antidepressant Presence acute chronic gastrointestinal disease ( e.g . IBD , coeliac disease , pancreatitis ) Uncontrolled hypertension ( 160/110 mm Hg ) Stenosis GI tract Bariatric surgery Abdominal surgery within last 6 month prior enrollment History eat disorder like bulimia , anorexia nervosa within past 12 month Other serious organ systemic disease cancer Any medication could influence GI function antibiotic , laxative , opioids , glucocorticoid , anticholinergic , antidiarrheal Pregnancy nurse Any medication use product treatment obesity ( e.g . Orlistat , fatbinder , carb/starch blocker , fatburner , satiety product etc . ) More 3 hour strenuous sport activity per week History abuse drug , alcohol medication Smoking cessation within 6 month prior enrolment Inability comply due language difficulty Presence factor ( ) , investigatorʼs judgement , preclude subject participation
